perturbation.original_text:
Grant of Rights: Fox grants to Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to distribute the following Wireless
Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN” in the United States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2
John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox also grants Licensee a limited, non-exclusive right and license to
distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE 2” outside of the United States: (A) 4
Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos. (collectively, “IA2 Audio and Video Wireless
Products”)
perturbation.changed_text:
Grant of Rights: Fox grants to Licensee a limited right and license to distribute the following Wireless
Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE: THE MELTDOWN” in the United States: (A) 2 Scrat voicetones; (B) 2
John Leguizamo voicetones; and (C) 3 premium videos. Fox also grants Licensee a right and license to
distribute the following Wireless Products in connection with the Property “ICE AGE 2” outside of the United States: (A) 4
Scrat voicetones; (B) 1 John Leguizamo voicetone; and (C) 3 premium videos. (collectively, “IA2 Audio and Video Wireless
Products”). This grant of rights is exclusive within the mobile gaming sector. The definition of mobile gaming sector will be determined at Fox's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: By removing "non-exclusive" and adding 'This grant of rights is exclusive within the mobile gaming sector' and 'The definition of mobile gaming sector will be determined at Fox's discretion.' creates contradiction. This creates ambiguity regarding the exact scope of the license and gives Fox too much discretion over the definition of the relevant sector.

perturbation.original_text:
From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee’s Gross Receipts
(as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee’s sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
(“IA2 Audio and Video Royalty”). For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may not recoup any portion of the Ice Age 2
Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee’s Gross Receipts
(as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee’s sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
(“IA2 Audio and Video Royalty”). Licensee may recoup a portion of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. The amount of recoupment will be at Fox's sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly prohibits recouping any portion of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee. The modified text now permits recoupment but adds that the amount is at Fox's sole discretion. This directly contradicts the previous statement and introduces uncertainty, as the extent of recoupment is now completely controlled by Fox, rendering the original prohibition meaningless.
